metadata.title: RA Family: How to create a test program when performing USB compliance testing in host mode?

sections.content:
Question:
How to create a test program when performing USB compliance testing in host mode?
Answer:
Please refer to "Usage Notes" -> "Compliance Test" under "USB (r_usb_basic)" in the FSP User's Manual. FSP has an implementation of USB test mode. You can see the implementation by looking for USB_CFG_COMPLIANCE in the FSP source code.
Suitable Products
RA/FSP
